titles.title: To direct the Federal Communications Commission to extend the final deadline for private land mobile radio licensees to migrate to narrowband technology by 2 years.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Energy and Commerce.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Communications and Technology.

committee.name: House Committee on Energy and Commerce

bill.summary: 11/15/2011--Introduced. Directs the Federal Communications Commission (FCC) to extend until January 1, 2015, the final deadline for private land mobile radio licensees in the 150-174 MHz and 421-512 MHz bands to migrate to narrowband technology.
